name: Elbow Macaroni and Kidney Bean Salad
author: Jennifer Rapp Griffis
summary: Red wine vinegar adds just the right touch to this delicious and easy dish.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 6 to 8 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Combine cooked macaroni, kidney beans, celery, light mayonnaise, onion, red wine vinegar, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until well mixed
Chill in refrigerator for at least 2 hours
